short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never mix up your local, test and live environment again! Markers show on pages and tabs. Share your settings with your team.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
URL Marker is an essential extension for web developers, testers and content editors working with multiple environments.

- Customisable markers shown at the top of the page
- Drag and drop the marker if it gets in your way
- The marker name also appears on the tab to help you multitask
- Comes with some common environment settings to get you started
- Share your JSON settings with your team
